newsitem.title: USA: Analytical Surveys buys MSE Corp.
newsitem.headline: Analytical Surveys buys MSE Corp.

text.p: Analytical Surveys Inc said on Wednesday it bought privately-held MSE Corp, a digital mapping and data conversion company, for roughly $11 million in cash and $7 million in restricted common stock.
Analytical Surveys financed the transaction with bank debt and MSE founder Sol Miller will join its board, it said.
MSE will operate as a wholly owned subsidiary of Analytical Surveys. It reported sales of $22 million and was profitable for its fiscal year ended December 31, 1996, Analytical Surveys said.
Analytical Surveys, which provides computerized mapping and datatbase services, said the acquisition would expand its position as a GIS serices provider.
